ActivityMetadata.Name: ZM Delete a Zoom Room
ActivityMetadata.Label: ZM Delete a Zoom Room
ActivityMetadata.Description: [Remove](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360033432032-Zoom-Room-Device-Profiles#h_e55b2092-c418-4b02-819f-44de51448900) a specific Zoom Room profile from a Zoom account. **Prerequisites:** * Pro or a higher plan with [Zoom Room](https://zoom.us/zoomrooms) license. **Scopes**: `room:write:admin`
